about_the_game:
Welcome to the arena! Gorilla Showdown is the ultimate musical, party fighting game. Channel your inner gorilla and run, grapple or bounce your way across the wacky maps with, or against your friends!

In the arena, you need to take control of the dance-pad in a King-of-the-Hill style battle ground, don’t get too comfortable grooving to the beat, because while you’re trying to get points, you’ll be the new target for everyone trying to take the dance pad from you!

Take control of the dance pad to gain points and secure the win in the arena!

Gorilla Showdown’s unique take on a King-of-the-Hill game centers around capturing the dance pad, forcing you to play a rhythm game whilst fending off your rivals.

At the start of each round, the power-ups on the dance machine change to create an entirely unique playing experience. Will you be flying around with a deadly laser and launching missiles, or will you be taking cover hiding away from them being used on you?

Team up with your friends or go solo to take the dance pad and bust out the best moves!

Load into a private lobby with some close friends, or take on the public lobbies to global bragging rights. Make use of the proximity voice chat, sure to create a good time.

Or if the regular game isn’t enough, jump into a round of Banana-Grab, a ‘Collect ‘Em All’ minigame perfect to break up any session with some goofy fun!

The weapons in Gorilla Showdown are unlike any you’ve seen before! Whether it’s a record that leaves behind a deadly laser, or a guitar that boomerangs back to you – all of the musical themed tools are unique, with their own strategies, perfect to make every game a different experience.

Will you dominate a specific weapon, or be versatile with the wide range of musical tools at your disposal?

Follow Us

Stay updated with the latest news and exclusive content by following us on our social medias.

You don’t want to miss out on this party!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 Gen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not currently supported, keyboard and mouse only
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection and a connection to Steam

short_description: Gorilla Showdown is a hilarious, action-packed, fighter game for up to 12 players online. Grab your friends and join in on the party while you groove to the music and fight to become the Top Monkey!
